title: Beat Street and Breakin' (1&2) Soundtracks
description:
Special thanks to oothefoxthat and crazylazar for making this torrent possible!

All 3 Soundtracks from the hit movies of 1984

2. Baptize the Beat
3. Frantic Situation
4. Beat Street Strut
5. Us Girls
6. This Could Be the Night

9. Give Me All
10. Nothing Gonna Come Easy
11. Santas Rap
12. It&#039;s Allright By Me
13. Battle Cry
14. Wappin&#039; (Bubblehead)
15. Into the Night
